nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation

Class CompareToValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation.CompareToValidation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PropertyValidation

    public class CompareToValidation
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertyValidation
    Invokes compareTo, the three booleans in the constructor determines whether -1, 0 or 1 are accepted as valid
    Author:
    luis
